metadata.name: Sema4 Desktop Action Getter
metadata.description:
This action package is used by the Runbook Tutor to retrieve available actions from the Sema4 
Desktop action servers. The returned actions will include their names and descriptions, but will
exclude actions used by the Runbook Tutor itself.

post.description:
Retrieve available actions from the Sema4 Desktop action servers. The returned actions will
include their names, descriptns and full OpenAI tool specification. You can exclude
certain actions from the return by passing them as internal actions.

names.title: Names
names.description: The names of the internal actions.

internal_actions.title: Internal Actions
internal_actions.description: A list of actions to exclude from the return.

api_spec.title: Api Spec
api_spec.description: The API specification of the action retrieved from the action server.

actions.title: Actions
actions.description: A list of actions available on the Sema4 Desktop action servers.

schema.title: Response for Get Actions
schema.description: A list of actions available on the Sema4 Desktop action servers.
